Package org.mythdroid.fragments

Class Summary
RecDetailFragment Shows a Recording's details.
RecEditFragment Edit a recording rule
RecEditGroupsFragment Edit recording and storage groups for a recording rule
RecEditSchedFragment Edit scheduling options for a recording rule
RecListFragment Displays a list of recordings
StatusBackendFragment Displays backend status
StatusFragment Lists other StatusFragment fragments.
StatusJobsFragment Displays upcoming/recent jobs
StatusRecordersFragment Displays the status of recorders
StatusScheduledFragment Displays scheduled recordings
